thread.title: Abducted woman not aide to Delta Speaker’s wife
thread.title_full: Abducted woman not aide to Delta Speaker’s wife

author: Okogba
title: Abducted woman not aide to Delta Speaker’s wife
text:
Home » News » Abducted woman not aide to Delta Speaker’s wife Abducted woman not aide to Delta Speaker’s wife On 11:17 pm In News by Okogba Comments 
By Emma Amaize 
M RS Ese Ogi, the woman abducted, Sunday, at her home in Sapele, Delta State, by a gang of hoodlums, following a botched attempt to kidnap her husband, is not a personal assistant to the wife of the Speaker of the Delta State House of Assembly. 
It was gathered that Mrs. Ogi had nothing to do with the wife of the Speaker. 
Meanwhile, at press time, she was still in the custody of the kidnappers.
